title: Detecting AI-Assisted Cheating in Online Exams through Behavior Analytics
summary: AI-assisted cheating has emerged as a significant threat in the context of online exams. Advanced browser extensions now enable large language models (LLMs) to answer questions presented in online exams within seconds, thereby compromising the security of these assessments.
